text: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِي يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ لَأَرۡجُمَنَّكَۖ وَٱهۡجُرۡنِي مَلِيّٗا
translation: 46. Nabii Ibraahim abba Aazar isi baxa Ibraahimik: Ibraahimow atu yi-Yallitteh Qibaadat derre cabtaah akaamih Qibaadah sangeltaa?atu tet buraa kee tct xaafuk raaqc waytek, diggah xeet gccdanot (xeet qambisiyya kinnuk) koo Qideyyok, xer wakti yok exxeeraay inkinnah yó lih mayaabina kaak iyye.
